raw_output: {"rfp_structure": {"rfp_metadata": {"rfp_id": "25-FAC-8892", "rfp_title": "Integrated Custodial and Janitorial Services (Main Campus & Athletic Facilities)", "issuing_organization": "North Summit University (NSU)", "issue_date": "2025-12-03", "due_date": "2026-01-15", "total_sites_count": 34, "rfp_type": "Janitorial/Custodial Services", "missing_critical_documents": []}, "global_requirements": {"contract_terms": {"term_duration_months": 36, "renewal_options": "Two (2) additional one-year periods", "total_potential_duration_months": 60}, "labor_requirements": {"minimum_wage": "18.50", "labor_conversion": "Living Wage Policy", "background_checks": "Nationwide criminal background checks (7-year lookback), 10-panel drug screens", "badging": "University Contractor ID badge required"}, "service_standards": {"standard_level": "APPA", "specific_standards": {"Group A": "APPA Level 1 (Orderly Spotlessness)", "Group B": "APPA Level 2 (Ordinary Tidiness)", "Group C": "APPA Level 3 (Casual Inattention)", "Group D": "Event-Driven (Athletic Concourses/Fieldhouse)"}, "inspection_frequency": "Once per month (Joint Inspections)", "deductions_for_failure": ["Missed Shift: $300 per employee per shift", "Failure to secure building: $500 per incident", "Running out of supplies: $100 per incident", "APPA Score below 80% for two consecutive months: 5% penalty"]}, "compliance_requirements": {"insurance_minimums": {"general_liability": 2000000, "workers_comp": true, "auto_liability": 1000000}, "certifications": {"chemicals": "Green Seal (GS-37) or EcoLogo", "equipment": "HEPA-rated vacuums (CRI Seal of Approval)"}, "supplies_equipment": {"vendor_provides": ["Cleaning chemicals", "Pads", "Mops", "Machinery", "PPE"], "university_provides": ["Toilet tissue", "Roll towels", "Hand soap", "Trash liners"]}}, "standard_cleaning_specs": {"daily_tasks": ["Dust mop with treated microfiber", "Spot damp mop spills", "Spot clean carpet stains", "Vacuum traffic lanes in lobbies/classrooms", "Empty trash from designated bins (Labs only)"], "weekly_tasks": ["Auto-scrub high-traffic corridors and lobbies", "Wall-to-wall vacuuming of offices and conference rooms", "Day Porter checks (3x) for restrooms"], "monthly_tasks": ["Machine scrub of ceramic tile floors in restrooms", "Deep clean of restrooms (grout restoration)"], "quarterly_tasks": ["Machine scrub and recoat VCT areas"], "annual_tasks": ["Complete strip and refinish (4 coats min) of all VCT", "Hot water extraction (steam clean) of all carpeted areas"]}}, "sites": [{"site_id":
